body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Lexington, Kentucky, native. Married to Matilda Prather Nicholas. Married to Mary Smith Nicholas. Father of Mary Jane Nicholas, George Nichols, Thomas Nicholas, Matilda Nicholas, Julia Nicholas, Margaretta Nicholas, Samuel S. Nicholas, Carry Ann Nicholas. Began practicing law in Louisville in 1825. Appointed agent and lawyer for the old United States Bank. Appointed as Judge of the State Court of Appeals in 1831. Appointed Chancellor at Louisville in 1827. In 1850 he was appointed to revise the Code of Practice.
